title: Iran and Europe unlikely to agree on nuclear pact in next few days - Rouhani
text:
Iranian President Hassan Rouhani speaks during the cabinet meeting in Tehran, Iran, September 4, 2019. Official President website/Handout via REUTERS ATTENTION EDITORS - THIS IMAGE WAS PROVIDED BY A THIRD PARTY. NO RESALES. NO ARCHIVES

DUBAI (Reuters) - President Hassan Rouhani said on Wednesday Iran was unlikely to reach a deal in the next few days with European parties to save the 2015 nuclear deal, state TV reported.

“I think it is unlikely that we will reach a result with Europe by today or tomorrow,” Rouhani said.

“Europe will have another two-month to fulfil its commitments,” he added.
description: President Hassan Rouhani said on Wednesday Iran was unlikely to reach a deal in the next few days with European parties to save the 2015 nuclear deal, state TV reported.
